text: avarkal yavarum um'mutaiya iraivanin camukattil varicaiyakak kontu varappatuvarkal; "nam unkalai mutal tatavai pataittavare tittamaka ippolutum ninkal nam'mitam vantu vittirkal, anal nam unkalukkaka vakkalikkappatta ittakaiya nalai erpatutta mattom enru ninkal ennik kontiruntirkal" (enru collappatum)
